Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: DVB
Reviews.Content: I tried using this cable with a coupler to extend a cable but I get a scrambled signal with only large lines through the picture and no picture at all really. The power connection is not flush to the cable that I am trying to extend. I ordered another coupler and will try again.On their own with a direct connection to a DVR they work very well and I would recommend them.

ProductInfo.Features:
•Premium quality Pre-made Siamese Cable with both BNC and Power Connectors for Ultimate Performance
•The 75 Ohm video conductor is surrounded by a heavy braided shield that provides maximum protection from stray RF (radio frequency), digital processing and radiated power signals
•Easy connection from a CCTV/Surveillance Camera to a Digital Video Recorder (DVR) and Power Supply
•Simplify installation by using a single cable for both power and video
LOT OF 2 FREE 2 RCA ADAPTERS WITH EACH CABLE
ProductInfo.Name: Cables Direct Online- LOT OF 2 WHITE 30 ft PREMIUM QUALITY PRE-MADE SECURITY CAMERA VIDEO POWER CABLE RG59 + 18/2
